thread.title: ECB Governing Council to discuss Greece on Monday afternoon - sources
thread.title_full: ECB Governing Council to discuss Greece on Monday afternoon - sources | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: ECB Governing Council to discuss Greece on Monday afternoon - sources
text:
FRANKFURT, July 6 The European Central Bank's Governing Council will discuss the provision of emergency funding to Greece's banks in a telephone conference call later on Monday afternoon, two people with direct knowledge of the issue said on Monday.
The call had originally been pencilled in for noon, one of the people said, but will now take place later in the afternoon.
(Reporting By John O'Donnell ; editing by Balazs Koranyi )
